attributes.action: Compensate fully the innocent organisers of public events where police have achieved cancellation based on undisclosed 'intelligence received' regarding the potential criminal actions of parties unrelated to the event organiser.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Last year two major public shows in Wales were closed in response to police insistence. Members of the public were denied their right to lawful assembly, traders in two Welsh towns lost business and the organiser of the shows now faces financial ruin. Parties affected by police action of this sort must have an effective means to challenge the police intervention, including the possibility of financial compensation for losses incurred.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Compensate fully the innocent organisers of public events where police have achieved cancellation based on undisclosed 'intelligence received' regarding the potential criminal actions of parties unrelated to the event organiser."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21790
